definition: (of water, prices etc) to rise and fall
to fall or drop/(of the sun) to set/(of a tide) to go out/to lower/to decline or sink/to lag or fall behind/to fall onto/to rest with/to get or receive/to write down/whereabouts/settlement
colloquial reading for 落[luo4] in certain compounds
to leave out/to be missing/to leave behind or forget to bring/to lag or fall behind

sentences.english: It is point out that the fluctuation of structure function lead to nonlinear scaling law.
sentences.chinese: 指出结构函数的振荡涨落导致非线性标度律。

sentences.english: The simulated hypoxia phenomena develop during the neap tide and disappear during the spring tide .
sentences.chinese: 缺氧现象的发展与减退受潮汐涨落的影响。

sentences.english: This property of the quantum fluctuations is known in statistical mechanics as ergodicity .
sentences.chinese: 这个量子涨落的性质在统计力学中称为遍历性。

sentences.english: The quantum fluctuation of this mesoscopic coupling circuit is also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 该文还讨论了介观电容耦合电路的量子涨落。

sentences.english: Quantum fluctuations inside the pockets were amplified along with the universe.
sentences.chinese: 该区域内的量子涨落随着宇宙膨胀而被放大。

sentences.english: But the mean temperature could disguise large fluctuations during the day.
sentences.chinese: 但是平均温度可能掩盖了一天之内温度大的涨落。

sentences.english: It's a common practice that changes in salary lag changes in prices.
sentences.chinese: 工资的涨落随物价变化而变化是常事儿。

sentences.english: The influence of fluctuation on an auto-oscillation system of Thomson-type is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论涨落对汤姆生型电子管振荡器的影响。

sentences.english: From those density fluctuations galaxies eventually formed.
sentences.chinese: 星系最终就是在这些密度涨落中形成的。

sentences.english: We obtain the distribution functions for quarks(and anti-quarks)and gluons under perturbation of the fluctuation of the color field.
sentences.chinese: 的夸克和反夸克在色场涨落扰动下偏离平衡较远。

sentences.english: His breakfast varied in cost from two to four sous, according as eggs were dear or cheap.
sentences.chinese: 午餐得花二至四个苏，随着蛋价的涨落而不同。

sentences.english: The fluctuation in range is called straggling .
sentences.chinese: 粒子射程的涨落称为歧离。

definition: (of a tide) to ebb or go out
to ebb and rise/to decrease and then grow
trough of a wave/(fig.) low point/lowest level
to undulate/to fluctuate/wave motion/rise and fall
